affymetrix.fusion.chp
Class FusionCHPLegacyData

java.lang.Object
  affymetrix.fusion.chp.FusionCHPData
      affymetrix.fusion.chp.FusionCHPLegacyData

public class FusionCHPLegacyData
extends FusionCHPData

Provides storage for data in a GCOS CHP file.
